name: Galaxy Photon (v1)
text: Return 1 "Galaxy" or "Photon" monster from your hand to your Deck and add 1 "Galaxy" or "Photon" Spell/Trap Card from your Deck to your hand. This Skill can only be used if you begin the Duel with a Deck/Extra Deck that contains no monsters other than LIGHT monsters. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
